net.trajano.auth.internal

Class JsonWebKeySet

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.trajano.auth.internal.JsonWebKeySet

  • public class JsonWebKeySet
extends Object
    JSON Web Key Set. Implements http://tools.ietf.org/html/draft-ietf-jose-json-web-key-29 TODO when supporting more methods, consider converting this to a composite pattern.
    Author:
    Archimedes Trajano

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Map<String,Key> keyMap
      Maps "kid" to the Key.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructs the JSON Web Key using the JSON object.

    • Field Detail

      • keyMap

        private final Map<String,Key> keyMap
        Maps "kid" to the Key. Instances of this classes are short lived and used in one thread context so concurrent use is not expected.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JsonWebKeySet

        public JsonWebKeySet(javax.json.JsonObject obj)
              throws GeneralSecurityException
        Constructs the JSON Web Key using the JSON object. Unsupported key usage scenarios are silently dropped.
        Parameters:
        obj - JSON object
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - problem with the crypto APIs

    • Method Detail

      • buildPublicKey

        private PublicKey buildPublicKey(javax.json.JsonObject keyJson)
                          throws GeneralSecurityException
        This builds the PublicKey based on the "kty" value. Unsupported key types are silently dropped.
        Parameters:
        keyJson - JSON object containing the key data
        Returns:
        public key
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - problem with the crypto APIs

      • buildRSAPublicKey

        private PublicKey buildRSAPublicKey(javax.json.JsonObject keyJson)
                             throws GeneralSecurityException
        Builds an RSA PublicKey. It uses "n" as the modulus and "e" as the public exponent.
        Parameters:
        keyJson - JSON object containing the key data
        Returns:
        public key
        Throws:
        GeneralSecurityException - problem with the crypto APIs

      • getKey

        public Key getKey(String kid)
        Gets a key given a Key ID.
        Parameters:
        kid - Key ID
        Returns:
        key

      • getKey

        public <T extends Key> T getKey(String kid,
                       Class<T> clazz)
        Gets a key given a Key ID with a specified type.
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        kid - Key ID
        clazz - type of key.
        Returns:
        key
